interpretation:
The "restroom" emoji signifies the need for a break or a pause in your journey. It can also represent the search for a private space to reflect or recharge. This card reminds you to take care of your physical needs and to honor your body's natural rhythms. It can also symbolize the importance of boundaries and respecting the personal space of others. 

In a reading, this card may suggest the need to take a break from a situation or to find a quiet space to reflect. It can also indicate a need for self-care or a reminder to honor personal boundaries. Overall, the "restroom" card encourages you to take care of yourself and your needs, and to respect the needs of those around you.
